amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in House Report 114-359 to prohibit the Act from taking effect until after the Energy Information Administration analyzed and published a report on the carbon impacts of the Act's provisions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 37 printed in House Report 114-359 to prohibit the Act from taking effect until after the Energy Information Administration analyzed and published a report on the carbon impacts of the Act's provisions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 243 (Roll no. 670).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 243 (Roll no. 670).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
